evidence.source_document: Memorandum Opinion and Order Granting Petitioner Osorto's Ex Parte Application for Release from Immigration Custody
evidence.text: On July 21, 2025, petitioner Carlos Osorto filed an ex parte application for release from immigration custody pending adjudication of his habeas petition. Docket no. 111.

extracted.value: Petitioner Carlos Osorto filed an ex parte application for release from immigration custody on July 21, 2025, seeking release pending adjudication of his habeas petition.

evidence.source_document: Memorandum Opinion and Order Granting Petitioner Osorto's Ex Parte Application for Release from Immigration Custody
evidence.text: On July 26, 2025, petitioner filed a reply brief.

extracted.value: Petitioner Carlos Osorto filed a reply brief to the court on July 26, 2025.

evidence.text: On July 3, Plaintiffs filed an application for a temporary restraining order, which Defendants opposed.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed an application for a temporary restraining order on July 3, 2025, requesting the court to enjoin the defendants from transferring them outside of the Central District of California.

evidence.text: Defendants filed two motions with this court requesting a stay pending appeal of the district court’s temporary restraining order. Case: 25-4312, 07/16/2025, DktEntry: 9.1.

extracted.value: Defendants filed two motions with the appellate court on July 16, 2025, requesting a stay pending appeal of the district court’s temporary restraining order.

evidence.text: On July 17, 2025, DHS filed a motion to schedule a bond hearing for petitioner, which was rejected as incorrectly filed.

extracted.value: Defendants (DHS) filed a motion to schedule a bond hearing for petitioner on July 17, 2025, which the court rejected as incorrectly filed.

evidence.text: On July 18, 2025, respondent filed a motion to schedule bond hearing.

extracted.value: Respondent (DHS) filed a motion to schedule a bond hearing on July 18, 2025, following petitioner’s renewed motion for bond redetermination.

evidence.text: EX PARTE APPLICATION for Temporary Restraining Order as to Transfer from District filed by Petitioners Osorto Carlos, Pedro Vasquez Perdomo, Isaac Villegas Molina. (Attachments: # 1 Declaration Stacy Tolchin, # 2 Declaration Cynthia Lucas, # 3 Proposed Order, # 4 Proof of Service) (Tolchin, Stacy) (Entered: 06/20/2025)

extracted.value: Petitioners Osorto Carlos, Pedro Vasquez Perdomo, and Isaac Villegas Molina filed an ex parte application for a temporary restraining order as to transfer from district on June 20, 2025.
